chart_description: This chart shows the total CPU utilization of the system. It helps to monitor the system's overall CPU usage and identify any potential bottlenecks.

dimension_descriptions.iowait: Amount of time the CPU spent waiting for I/O operations to complete.
dimension_descriptions.nice: Amount of CPU time given to processes that have a positive nice value (lower priority)
dimension_descriptions.softirq: Amount of time spent handling softirq interrupts. This happens when the kernel has tasks that need to be executed on behalf of some hardware event.
dimension_descriptions.system: Amount of CPU time spent in kernel-space (i.e. executing system calls or managing hardware)
dimension_descriptions.user: Amount of CPU time spent in user-space (i.e. executing user applications)
